# OpenShift Cost Report

## Summary

Total OpenShift Cost for 2024-02: $3,300.00

```json:table
{
  "filter": true,
  "items": [
    {
      "name": "parent",

      "total": 3300.0
    }
  ],
  "fields": [
    {
      "key": "name",
      "label": "Name",
      "sortable": true
    },
    {
      "key": "items_total",
      "label": "Self App ($)",
      "sortable": true
    },
    {
      "key": "child_apps_total",
      "label": "Child Apps ($)",
      "sortable": true
    },
    {
      "key": "total",
      "label": "Total ($)",
      "sortable": true
    }
  ]
}
```
